sentences.english: Robert was well away after the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮之後羅伯特已是醉態百出。

sentences.english: He confuses his opponents with his drunken shape and defeats his opponents by surprising move.
sentences.chinese: 形醉意不醉，用醉態迷惑對手，出奇制勝。
她錯誤地判斷了他的醉態。

sentences.english: My dear, you are charming when you are drunk.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，你的醉態真迷人。

sentences.english: In February, Nakagawa resigned as finance minister in disgrace after appearing drunk at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 中川昭一2月因在新聞會上露醉態而辭去財相職務。
